body: There's no route package yet. At this moment some (reusable) code fragments exist in syscall package. I'm sure I don't understand the difference between vendoring and duplication. It's just a thought that placing code on golang.org/x/net repository instead of standard library might be helpful for people who want to maintain each operating system's package/port collections. Do you have any suggestion on how to make a open-closed package, which is open for dependency management and closed for dependency hell.
